§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e But... I wanted to do it, my emperor!

Talk to me before facing Apiglo. I'm back here!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Glaivorus! Show these insolent intruders why I'm the emperor!
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e Gladly, my emperor!

§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c It's clear that if you want to do something...
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c You have to do it yourself!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Glaivorus, kill them! Now!!
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e Worry not, my emperor.
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e I will spread their guts on the floor!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c I need... a rest...
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e I'm sorry, emperor, I couldn't...
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c SILENCE!
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e ...
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Servants! You better end them right now!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c I'm... Sick! of you.
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c I will end you here and now!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Glaivorus... Don't you dare fail me now.
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e As you command... Emperor...
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Glaivorus you are USELESS! Why are they still alive?!
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e It is you who are nothing without MY power.
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c How dare you say such a thing! I am the EMPEROR!
§6§o§l<Glaivorus>§e You don't need me? Very well, I'll leave them to you!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c No... NO! Glaivorus, come back! I COMMAND you!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Wait! Please, don't kill me!
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c W-we can negotiate.
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c I can grant you unthinkable power if you let me live!
End him! Without his blade, he's completely defenseless.
§4§o§l<Apliglo>§c Be ready to scream!

§9the Conqueror. A symbol of hope. Perhaps someone
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b2.dialogo: §4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Koros... we have failed. The universe is doomed... Because of me.
I'm sorry, Creator.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Very well...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You shall feel the heat of a thousand stars!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Very smart!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c But is it enough?
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I see I wasn't underestimating you.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Get ready!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c It is over!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Prove to me I'm not mistaken with you!
Warning! In this phase Thar Kroo will cast §6Flaming Field§f §ctwice§f as many times!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c It's the moment of truth!
Fire will soon spread! Seek for a safe place among the flames!
Thar Kroo... My creator... He sacrificed to grant us the §cred core§f, and his §epower§f...
The Conqueror §ewill not§f be able to §edominate§f your minds!
We cannot fail now, you are the only spark of hope that exists.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Enough!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You have surpassed all my challenges.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I know you're worthy, and I trust you with the future of the galaxy.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c When you complete the monument with the cosmic cores, you will be able to travel to §oParadox Citadel§r§c.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You will be on his territory, and I... won't be able to come with you.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c He can dominate your minds, but I shall grant you a fragment of me to resist his control.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I hope that, in name of peace, my sacrifice shan't be in vain!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I hope that all lives I destroyed can forgive me.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Koros... you have guided them here...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Guide them to a better future.
I will not mistake you... Creator.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You have finally arrived.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I've been waiting for a long time.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c And know you shall know the truth...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I... am §lThe Conqueror§r§c.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Or at least, I used to.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Years ago, when I was young, they conquered my natal world, killing nigh all members of my species.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c That very day I swore to seek revenge.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I would conquer and bring peace to this galaxy, so that no one else ever had to suffer what my species suffered.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c My methods were detestable, as you have seen. I was sure the end would justify the means.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Invasions, Blackfire... However, the worst would come later.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c After stealing knowledge from §eEothar§c, dominating §eAphofis§c and reuniting all §eCosmic Cores§c I learnt how to §etravel in time§c.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c With this power I became invincible and reached my revenge.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I unified galaxy and obtained peace... Or so I thought.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c With time, I noticed that my own society was a ruthless empire.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c And in the end... I annihilated everything.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Full of regret, I traveled to the past seeking heroes that could right my wrongs.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c You shall be who stop my younger self in your present, before he dominates §eAphofis§c and completes the first travel in time.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Otherwise, it shall be too late.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c But first...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Face me!
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c And prove to me you are strong enough to receive my power!
Talk to me before facing Thar Kroo! There are things you must know...
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b3.dialogo: §6§o§l<Ectron> §eW-who will continue my research if I'm gone?
Good job, heroes. I was very worried when the Conqueror appeared.
You've been witness of a fragment of his power... And he almost destroys you...
There is much more fighting up ahead...
Talk to me before facing Ectron! I know how you can beat him.
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eThe experiment has been a total success!§c
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eSoon even the Conqueror will pale in comparison to my power!§c
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eCome close! It won't hurt! I promise...§c
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eI will scorch your flesh, until you're nothing but embers!§c
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eLet's see how you fare against these toys!§c
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eIt is time to carbonize these lab rats!
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eWell! Seems like the lab rats do know how to run!
§cWhile I have energy from the towers... I'm invincible!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cEctron... It's embarrasing, that I must come to your aid...
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cPeace is the most noble of causes, and your weak minds cannot grasp it.
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cThat is why you deserve to be squashed like worms!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cBehold how they shrivel with my mere presence!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cFaithless... Vulnerable... You hold no chance whatsoever.
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cAnd yet... You allow them to remain alive because you are §lWEAK§c!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cYou cannot be entrusted with my holy task any longer!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cYou are a danger, letting this betrayers of peace triumph!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cI leave you at their mercy!
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eNo... No!! Please don't leave me here!
§4§o§l<The Conqueror> §cYou shall receive your just punishment!
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eI beg you on my knees! Don't leave me with these monsters!
§6§o§l<Ectron> §eI've always served you! Why do you do this now?!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b3.h2.msg_: Careful! The energy bar is filled and you're taking damage!
luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b4.dialogo: Get under my shield or you won't make it!
<Thar Kroo>
§cWhy do you insist on protecting them, Eternal?
§cWhy do you stand in the path of peace?!
§cWhy are you on their side and not MINE?!
§cYou aren't worthy of its legacy!
§cDISAPPEAR!!
§cDo not resist!
I don't know how long I can resist!
Warriors, help me! Thar Kroo has lowered his guard!
This is your last chance!
§cYour end is inevitable!
§aHelp Koros!
His power increases... Keep attacking!
§cYOU...
§cSHALL NOT DEFEAT ME!!!
The Conqueror is weak! Continue!
You shall fall, Thar Kroo!
§cI SHALL NOT!
§cI SHALL BRING PEACE!
§c§lI!
§c§lAM!!
§c§lPEACE!!!
§c§lITSELF!!!!
§cAnd thus is how fate always favors heroes...
§cAnd it prevents villains like you from triumphing.
§cOnce more, I am granted victory against savages like you.
§cI am the chosen!
§cThe core of an Eternal... In my hands... Finally.
§cAll thanks to your honorable sacrifice!
§cThe location of the §dCosmic Monument§c lies in it.
§cWith the §dCosmic Cores§c and §eAphofis§c under my control...
§cMy power over §etime§c shall be total!
§cYou cannot change the fate of the galaxy. You never could!
§cMy job here is done.
§cAphofis!
§cMarch to the §dCosmic Monument§c!
§cMy army is infinite.
§cYou could fight until exhaustion without my troops ending!
§cSurrender now, and I shall grant you a quick and clean death!
Not this time, Thar Kroo!
§4§l<Thar Kroo> §cInteresting...
§4§l<Thar Kroo> §cLong ago I admired your species, little Eternal...
§4§l<Thar Kroo> §cBut peace can only be achieved through war!
§cGet away!
Don't... let... him...
§cPoor Eternal! You cannot run anymore! Accept your fate!
My power is dissipating!
My power has dissipated! Survive as long as you can!
Resist! Prove to Thar Kroo that his army can be beaten!
§cBehold how my infinite army sends you to oblivion!
Heroes, I've granted you a part of my power! End with as many as you can before it dissipates!
§cI must admit my future self has suprised me.
§cI never thought worms like you could even harm me!
§cYour determination and dexterity is admirable...
§cHowever... This is but the beginning.
§cI can still recover my strength and close my wounds.
§cCan't you see!? You hold no chance!
§cAnd now... Accept your tragic end!
Stand under my shield or you won't make it!
§cAnother pathetic attempt from my future self...
§cConquest is inevitable!
§cStand before me, warriors!
§cYou arrive here, sent on his behalf...
§cI should tell you, you know not the entire truth...
§cYou're not the first ones...
§cYou're but another sacrifice in the list of pawns sent by him!
§cHe sacrificed before you, and told you of your ''Glorious purpose''
§cYes... I know that story. It has happened countless times...
§cAnd it always has the same end.
§cHe continues to send corpses in the making!
§cBut I think you shan't surrender...
§cSo let's end this once and for all!
§cPrepare everything you have, as it will be your end!
Talk to me before facing the Conqueror! There are things you must know...

luisb1202.functions.bossfight.b5.dialogo: <Koyomi>
Trident rain!
FYOOOM! Tridents!
You're not expecting this!
You better run!
What do you think of this!?
<Gariheuz>
§cThese arrows are infused with deadly dragon poison!
§cOut of the way, Koyomi!
§cMove, Koyomi! Don't make me waste arrows!
Stop shooting me!
Where are you aiming at!?
§cDragon Arrowstorm!
§cAre you faster than my arrows?
Make the §earrow§r collide with Koyomi's §dshield§r!
§cAlright, alright! Enough!
§cI think... we can reach an agreement.
Listen Gariheuz, they didn't give us a break. We're exhausted!
It's fair for them to take it this time.
§cAfter all we've been through to get here? Forget it!
You know they're stronger than us both.
The sooner you accept it, the sooner we can go search some other treasure.
§cAhhhgg! Fine... Listen here!
§cThis shall be the last time you take my bounty!
§cYou can take the core... But the next time, I won't be leaving empty-handed.
You've proven to be tough. You're worthy of the core as a reward.
We'll met in the future, adventurers.
Until we meet again.
§cHah! Bite the dust!
Perhaps it'd be better to negotiate. No?
§cIt's impossible to negotiate with people like them!
§cIt's time to set things straight!
Let the best one win!
§cYou fell for it!
§cRight into my trap!
§cEasy to deceive!
Only those affected with §5purple poison§f, can see where the §ctrident rain§f will fall!
§cTruth and illusion merge into one!
§cTime passes... Like poison courses through your veins!
§cVery clever! You've escaped the illusion... For now.
§cIt's time to put these idiots to rest!
§cFeel how poison courses through you and changes reality!
Leave them to me, Gariheuz!
I'll teach them the core belongs to us!
§cYou never learn, do you!?
I'll crush them with my trident, Gariheuz!
§cLet's work together, Koyomi!
Let's see how you like this!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Alright, alright! Stop, stop! White flag!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz> §8(Panting)§c You really are tough... I admit it... but... we're not done yet.
§o§l<Koyomi>
Gariheuz, they've proven to have guts. It's fair for them to take the core. We've lost.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Are you kidding? After all we've fought to get here!
Stop being so stubborn! They're impressive in combat. They've earned more than our respect.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c ...
§o§l<Echo of Koros>§f Who did you give §eAphofis§f to!?
You won't enjoy hearing this, but... Sadly, we had no other choice.
§eAphofis§r is in §eThe Conqueror§r's hands.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c But listen! Make no mistake. We don't work for him, nor did we give it to him willingly.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c §eThe Conqueror§c is absurdly powerful. Had we not followed his orders, he probably would have reduced us both to styxian essence...
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Like everyone who tried betraying him...
Adventurers! The core is all yours.
Gariheuz and I shall part in search of new adventures and challenges.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c It's hard to admit, but... I'm glad I faced you. I never expected to feel the adrenaline and excitement of adventure in a defeat.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Good luck in your adventure... You'll need it.
Until we meet again!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Stop right there!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c It seems we meet again, adventurers.
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c I suppose you've had un fighting those horrible mosquitoes, but...
This is our bounty. We got here first!
§o§l<Echo of Koros>§f That is unfair! We opened up the path!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c And I captured the cosmic dragon-snake that would have ripped your head right off!
You? May I remind you who delivered the final blow, Gariheuz?
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Whatever! We've all had a great part in getting here... And we all want the cosmic core for our own interest.
§o§l<Echo of Koros>§f It was you. For whom did you capture Aphofis? Why do you want the cores? Answer!
Very important personal things that are none of your business!
§4§o§l<Gariheuz>§c Very well. Let us decide fairly. §eLet's fight§c for the §3Cyan Cosmic Core§c right here, like true adventurers.
Winner takes all!
§o§l<Echo of Koros>§f You have no idea of what the stakes are.
Rules are rules... There are no such things as heroes in this galaxy.
§o§l<Echo of Koros>§f Heroes, talk to me before facing the bountyhunters. I know how to defeat them.
Talk to me before fighting! I can help you beat this encounter.

§4§o§l<The Conqueror>§c Do not disappoint me again.
§4§o§l<???>§c The shine and fulguration of the countless stars that form it.
§4§o§l<???>§c Soon, each and every one of them shall be reached by the hand of destiny.
§4§o§l<???>§c A tragic and unavoidable destiny, stained of §ewhite§c... and of §eblood§c.
§4§o§l<???>§c In the future, you were heroes who sacrificed all to stop the imminent darkness.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c I, §eThar Kroo§c, am a time traveler...
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c Who, with his last effort, returned to this moment, to help you change the course of events.
§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c So that you may triumph where you last failed.

§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c The last hope of stopping the incoming §egreat darkness§c is placed upon you.

§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c His noble purpose of bringing peace to a divided galaxy...

§4§o§l<Thar Kroo>§c He's unstoppable, and his power, overwhelming.

§fGreetings, apprentice! Allow me to introduce myself... I am Eo, the warden of the §eClocktower§f. As you know, the tower was built over an anomalous and sacred terrain able to alter time around it. For years, we've been researching its secrets and protecting them from those who wish to make irreverent use of time travel. Defending and respecting the laws of causality is my duty, and shall be yours too in the future. I've left an §3§lEpochwalker§f by your §ewindow§f, and several §enotes scattered around the village§f so you can start your §epilgrimage§f through time using the §dpillars§f.

§fThough not all the refugees of our species arrived here after the invasion of our home, the §9§lHeavenly Citadel§f, truth is it was quite lucky to find this place and stay here. After storing the cosmic core in a safe place, we researched the mystic temporal secrets that this exotic land hides. I doubt there's a place with properties like these in the entire galaxy. 

 From here, you have incredible views of the §eClocktower§f, the structure we built in order to better understand the temporal phenomena that occur here, and that nowadays take many of our species to travel here. With the §cred hand§f we control the §cpresent§f, and the §3blue one§f controls §3what is beyond our present§f.
§fTo all guards who read this note; Please meet as soon as possible inside the house with the §eX seal§f, there is a §l§cvery important §r emergency to discuss.

§fThe parts of the §dpillars§f must be alligned and fit to the milimiter. That's why all pieces where forged by §6my brother§f, only he could manage. The §cred hand§f of the §eClocktower§f indicates the current time. However, the function of its counterpart, the §3blue hand§f, is unique and quite intriguing. If the §3blue hand§f points towards III, an echo of yourself will appear in the present, reflecting the last action you undertook at III. This proves highly useful to §eactivate two §dpillars§e simultaneously§f and §eaccumulate their time§f, since it always captures the final action you took prior to time-shifting.

To illustrate with an example: if it's currently III and I activate the §dpillar I§f, the time shifts to I. If I then employ the §3§lEpochwalker§f to set the §3blue hand§f to III, I will bring forth the version of myself from III who was activating the §dpillar I§f. As a result, if I were to then activate the §dpillar III§f, the §dpillar I§f would also get activated simultaneously, as my echo would be activating it in unison with me, thereby transitioning to §eIV§f.§7 (I+III)

§fThough we never discovered how to travel thorugh time beyond the 12 hour margin that the Clocktower allows, we could find out. However, our moral code strictly forbids it. Imagine what someone able to travel through time with complete freedom could do, without the protection of the Clocktower. Who knows what terrible anomalies and paradoxes could appear.

§fIn one of our trips using the §dpillars§f we discovered a §every useful anomaly§f. As it is, some §enumbers§f from the pillars take §edifferent values based on the direction you look at them§f upon activation. For example, number III always has the same value, but such is not the case for every number.

Don't you know me? I'm Gariheuz, one of the greatest, if not the greatest, bountyhunter from this galaxy.
§e▶ §7The greatest bountyhunter? What are you doing here?
§e▶ §7Return.§7
I come seeking adrenaline, new objectives and new challenges. Since my great triumph in draconic lands, adventuring just hasn't felt the same.
§e▶ §7Are you speaking of Bani? What happened?
No, its reincarnation, Aphofis. It was a heroic battle until exhaustion. In the end, the beast fell to me.
§e▶ §7Is that the head you have back there?
No... Aphofis is as big as a mountain, and its roar and wings make the earth tremble. That head is just a representation of it I got from a statue I found.
§e▶§7 Impressive! What's your objective now?§7
Those things are left in secret. And moreso to rookies like you.
Those things are left in secret.
§e▶§7 I understand...§7
§e▶ §7Rookies?!
I never heard from you. What makes you think you're strong enough to survive these lands?
§e▶ §7We'll show you!
Very well. Prove to me I'm wrong and bring me the head of 3 wild beasts... If you can. That way you can become someone, earn my respect, and maybe even a reward.
§e▶ §7I accept!
Let's see if you have what it takes.
This is the quest I gave you to earn my respect.

§7§oObtain the heads of 3 §2wild beasts§7§o and give them to Gariheuz. There is a §2wild beast§7§o in every area of this intersection. You'll recognize the item because of the §2green§7§o color of its name. You will obtain a §ereward§7§o for obtaining 2 heads and a §efinal reward§7§o if you obtain the 3.
Careful! A §2wild beast§f appeared nearby. End it to §eclaim its head§f.

luisb1202.functions.carga_lanas.obtener_: You've unlocked new talents. Visit me when you can to select a new ability!
luisb1202.functions.forja.atacrom.dialog: Good idea. Let's get to it.
Quite insightful. Give me some time.
That may work. Wait for a second.
Good enough. Let's try.
Using the forge often exposes your body to the power of the
Stygian Remnants
. For every forged item, you become more exposed, and sometimes you'll obtain §apermanent§f health upgrades.
§e▶ §7Understood, thanks.
What do you have there? The handwriting looks familiar. Give me that!
§e▶ §7There you go.
It can't be! After all this time, my sister... Let me read it.
§e▶ §7Are you Athar'Krom?.
§7§o(While he reads the card, the papers is slowly torn and the shine of his eyes becomes wrathfully intense.)
§e▶ §7A temporal nightmare ended everyone in there... I'm very sorry.

Damned... Damned! §eThe Conqueror§f cares not to end half a galaxy to obtain what he wants... All the time I served him, hiding the fact he killed my own sister... If I had known, I would have forged §ethe damn blade§f he requested... And I would have §estabbed him§f in the chest!
§e▶ §7What are you talking about?
It matters not... It's better for that blade to never see the light of day. But... I will avenge Eo... I swear! I will make him pay for this and suffer for every second that is left of the universe.
§e▶ §7I think the best you could do is channel that wrath to forge weapons that can help us defeat him.

I need to think... Thank you for bringing this here, the last will of my sister. She gave her life to keep the secrets of time and protect the universe from people like The Conqueror. With her, time was safe; With him, who knows what lies in the future... Please take this, as proof of my gratefulness.
§e▶ §7Receive item.
During your journey, you shall obtain
Forge Materials
. Each Forge Material has an §eunique matching item§f. If you manage to get both matching items in this anvil and have 12
Stygian Remnants

in your inventory, I'll be able to forge a §dpowerful item§f, perhaps even a§6 legendary one§f, for you. 

 To place items in the anvil, §edrop them§f nearby.

 Pay attention to the §edetails§f of the Forge Materials to properly match them.
§e▶ §7How do I get Stygian Remnants?
So you made it... My revenge, achieved at last...
§e▶ §7We couldn't have made it without you, Atacrom!
I'm somewhat glad I helped you defeat him, but I wish I could have looked at him in the eye when he died, or that I could have taken his life myself.
§e▶ §7Koros didn't make it out alive.

Nothing shall ever repair the damage that The Conqueror caused, much like nothing can bring back those we lost in the way. My sister... Koros achieved his goals, much like I achieved revenge. I know not my purpose now... I have nothing left. I must think...
§e▶ §7Thank you, Atacrom. Hopefully we'll meet again.
I trust you can use this well.
Well... there you go.
Fixed!
Freshly made!
Not bad. All yours.
Ectron was a good rival, but I make the best weapons.
I'll miss you, sister.
The materials don't match.
Not a good idea.
Impossible. Try something else...
Not going to work. Try again.
Doesn't look good. Any other ideas?
Hey... Where did you get these materials? I forged a very similar one for a young piglin long ago...
You found every item I could forge... I feel my power... returning. Congratulations!
Perhaps one of the mightiest blades I've ever forged. The power of creatures like Koros lies within it.
Perhaps one of the mightiest blades I've ever forged. The power of creatures like Thar Kroo lies within it.
Don't lose your head.
Mind your steps.
Don't get overconfident.
Stay alive.
Careful out there.
Talk... Come on.
What do you want now?
My forge is eternal.
I give new purpose to metal.
I hope you've got something.
The forge hungers, hasten up.

§e▶ §7What's the progress bar below?

▶ Is this letter for you?
▶ The Conqueror has fallen.

I could restore this insignia pretty well, but I would just keep it hidden. I know where it may come from, I don't like it.

Years ago, in another life, I refused to use my abilities to create weapons for §cThe Conqueror§f. He sentenced me to death, and my body and soul were consumed by §dBlackfire§f until I became nothing but

. Koros recovered my remnants, rebuilt my soul and mind, and anchored them to my armor and hammer. 

 Since then, I have a new purpose; Helping chosen heroes to achieve my vengeance against §cThe Conqueror§f.
§e▶ §7What are Stygian Remnants?

They're the ashes that §dBlackfire§f leaves upon consuming a soul. They're a source of great power and also a catalyst of magic.

 Using the power of this remnants is using the power of The Conqueror against him. A taste of his own medicine!
§e▶ §7Black... Fire?
What rock have you been living under? You must be the only one in this galaxy that hasn't heard about §dBlackfire§f. It's the sinister weapon §cThe Conqueror§f uses in his personal crusade.
§e▶ §7The one who lives under a rock is           actually you.
You have a chance to get some
upon slaying enemies with modifiers.
Omega... I feel like I once met someone with a similar name...
I hope you have a good reason to interrupt me.
I see you're still alive... I'm glad... A bit.
My hammer and I greet you.
Need to forge anything?
The forge greets you, for now.
I'm not exactly an engineer... But I think it's pretty decent.
Very funny! You better return to Koros before I make you!
§e▶ §7Understood, sorry.
You've been to the §eMagma Foundry§f? As you know, during my life I forged weapons for §cThe Conqueror§f in that damned place. Before telling you how to survive, I'd like to §erequest something§f...
§e▶ §7What is it?
§e▶ §7Be back later!

As you know, §cThe Conqueror§f sentenced me to death when I refused to forge weapons for him when I found out his intentions. The breaking point was §eProject Nightfall§f, one of his darkest ambitions. And, recently I found out he §ekilled my sister§f... Well, I've been thinking about §ethe blade§f I told you about...
§e▶ §7Project... Nightfall?

§eProject Nightfall§f, in theory, consisted in creating a legendary and powerful §eblade§f that dominated its wielder's adversaries. Thank §eBani§f I never finished it, but its plans and my old forge remain somewhere in the §eMagma Foundry§f.
§e▶ §7What are you trying to tell me?

We could §efinish the blade§f and use it to defeat §cThe Conqueror§f. If we manage to, he won't be able to do anything about it. The problem is that the §ethree plans of the sword§f are lost in the interior halls, and §ethe forge§f is in the uppermost part of the area.
§e▶ §7I'll help, but... How can I resist within           the inner halls?
Stygian gas, eh? The §bRespiration Enchantment§f can help you withstand that contamination. If you want, I can §eenchant your helmets myself§f in exchange for all your levels.

The §efirst plan§f and the §esecond plan§f show you the basic controls of the forge and how to move the runes of the floor. The §ethird plan§f explains how the runes on the floor must be and how to place the parts of the sword. §c§nThe parts of the sword shall appear when the runes of the floor are correct.
§e▶ §7I don't understand the §ethird plan§7.
§e▶ §7I understand...

The §ethird plan§f shows a frontal view of the forge. In the first drawing, you can see the placement of the six runes in the floor. The black marks are their shadows upon being rotated. The three runes in front are lowered, so that the rest can be seen from that perspective.
Hold your helmet in your §emaainhand§f. Be warned you will §close all your levels§f.
§e▶ §7Go ahead!
§e▶ §7Hey, actually... I'll enchant it myself.
There you go!
§e▶ §7I wanted to tell you something...

My old forge... Horrible memories come to mind. But it matters not! Did you get the §eplans §fto prepare the forge? If so, tell me when the §aforge and the sword are§f set and ready! I'm excited to achieve revenge... To avenge §emy sister§f!
§e▶ §7The blade is §aready§7 to be forged!
§e▶ §7Sorry... What plans are you talking about?

Don't you remember? The quest I gave you! In the inner tunnels there are §ethree plans§f that detail how to §eprepare the forge§f to create the blade. I'd do it myself... But I'm not exactly tangible, and I lost most of my memories when I became this armor.

Gariheuz's bountyhunter insignia... That's gonna be handy to impersonate him and skip some checks. Y'know. Not long ago we stole some treasures from Gariheuz, maybe they interest you.

luisb1202.functions.talentos.minikoros.d: Some buildings of this place are §eonly accessible at a given time§f. You must find out how to §ethe hands of the clocktower§f to be able to §eaccess their interior§f and discover more about this place. It also seems like §etemporal corruption§f also affected us, calling onto us §cmimic temporal predators§f that will try to hunt us from now on.

A temporal cataclysm affected this village long ago. All remains exactly as it was the day of catastrophe, though temporal corruption has reached every place and taken every inhabitant. We must find out more about this place to be able to find the §7§lGray Cosmic Core§f.
Outsiders took this sanctuary long ago and shall fight back, but we have two objectives here: The §9Blue Cosmic Core§f and finding the portal to the §dCosmic Realm§f.
§e▶ §7The Cosmic Realm? Have I been there before?

Exactly, a place where all Cosmic Cres will be able to combine their power and find out where and when is the §d§oParadox Citadel§r, The Conqueror's base of operations. It's impossible you've been there, my maker sealed that portal. But we §emust reopen it§f with the power of the §9Blue Cosmic Core§f.
§e▶ §7How come they haven't used the Core to open the portal yet?
An ancient mechanism hides the Core away. My maker told me that §eonly when all stars gaze towards the Cosmic Core§f, it will be revealed. We have to find out what he meant.

This mystic world, once called the §9§lHeavenly Citadel§f, was the §enative home §fof The Conqueror and his species. Peace in this kingdom lasted for eons, until bloodthirsty outsiders arrived and killed everyone, except him and a couple survivors... It was the beginning of §eThe Conqueror§f's noble motive: Peace. With time, he lost his way, and now he believes peace can only be brought with §cblood§f and §csacrifice§f.
Need me to remind you anything?
§e▶ §7What do you know of the shiny stars?
§e▶ §7What do you know of the statues?

Every 3 minutes a meteor shower will fall upon us. It is §cunavoidable§f and goes through all celings and walls. The only way to survive is to §eget under my shield§f or use a §etome of invulnerability§f. I will tell you when one arrives and I will §eteleport next to one of you§f when it arrives to protect you. So §estay close§f to be protected!

Some §ecolorful flowers§f that have interesting effects upon being destroyed. Mind that they can §ebenefit§f both §eyou§f and §eenemies§f! I'll be able to tell you their effects once you try them. Come back if you need to check the information!

The citadel that lies here is the result of a surprising cosmic event. Long ago, an alien flower fell onto this asteroid. The flower expanded until it covered everything with an exhuberant, unique vegetation.

A group of survivors from the conquest managed to get here seeking refuge. Since then, they maintain an interesting symbiotic relationship where the rock and its inhabitants take care of each other and fight against intruders.

The climate in this strange meteor is very §cdangerous§f. Now and again, §cdeadly showers§f of stygian meteorites that can annihilate any unprepared outsider will take place. Additionally, you'll quickly become acquinted with the... peculiar §avegetation§f.
§e▶ §7How can I survive the meteor showers?

The §oMakers§f never created the Green Core in fear that someone would gather them all and use their power for evil. That's why we're here, to §ecreate§f ourselves the §aGreen Cosmic Core§f. Howerver, we'll need a §eCosmic Receptacle§f as a base to create the §aGreen Core§f. The §eMegamatrix§f carefully protects these receptacles and let's no one get near.
§e▶ §7Fine. How do I beat the Megamatrix?
Indeed, §eit can stop its bullets§f, but §cnot its missiles§f.

These §6defense matrixes§f summon §cTerrastalkers§f when they feel a threat nearby and are §eimmune§f to all damage. I don't quite know how to destroy these §6defense matrixes§f. You'll have to find out yourselves...
They're deadly siege weapons with four hydraulic-based legs. They have a 70-mm turret and §cmissile launchers§f.

These two supreme creature disappeared when their creation was done, and left behind a branching defense system to protect this holy place in their absence; §eThe Megamatrix§f.
